page.title: 16GETTING AROUND IN EDMONTON
page.content: A lot of people in my area (Edmonton) use the London buses for transport, there are many routes and after a while you learn them by heart. The W.8(Wooly eight) is popular with the kids from our school (Latymer). Unexperienced passengers, especially small ones, can get trampled on just trying to get on the buses. Walking is also hazardous, firstly crossing the busy roads, secondly dodging the people running for the British Rail train to London. There are Zebra and Pelican crossings to facilate pedestrains but not everywhere. Other people use push bikes or motor bikes to get around and to get to school but many people use the buses or just walk.
